description: This test validates if the textbox is reset after sending a message.

steps.name: Login to the application with valid credentials
Navigate to the Student Information Screen
Navigate to the My Lesson Page
Send a message in the controversy field
Verify that the textbox is reset

statusDetails.message: Textbox is not reset. It still contains: Test amaclidir bitirme projesi olarak test otomasyonu kodluyorum ==> expected: <true> but was: <false>
